header_text: You're going on a long car ride with your family to visit family in another part of the state. After an hour, you notice your phone battery is almost dead and you don't have a charger. You think about the rest of the car ride and feel like you will be miserable.

elements.text: After worrying about it for a few minutes, you realize that you can use this time to talk to your family. You feel ...
